author: Callum Booth
title: Huawei P40 Pro first impressions: Superb hardware let down by shoddy software
description: Before we get started, let’s make something clear: I only got my hands on the brand spanking new Huawei P40 Pro this morning. Everything in this article is based off a couple of hours of use, so is meant for more of a guide of what to expect, than an in-depth…
